Crypto: Focus on cryptocurrency, stablecoins and DeFi. Including Bitcoin, ethereum, binance, and decentralized web3 networks.
Finance: Focus on financial markets, investing, and commodities analysis, including stocks, bonds, and macroeconomic trends.
Politics: Focus on current political affairs, government, and policy debates, both domestic and international.
Tech: Focus on consumer technology, hardware, apps, and digital trends.
UK: Focus on all topics related to the United Kingdom, including news, history, culture, and geography.
World: Focus on global news, international events, and cross-cultural commentary.
Dev: Focus on Startups and Dev related news. Things like HackerNews and Ycombinator
